content: this crochet pattern creates a beautiful lacy shawl featuring delicate flower blossoms this design is great for your special evening out or wedding a free written copy of this pattern can be found on my ad supported blog as of june 9 2021 a free video tutorial can be found on my youtube channel as of june 9 2021 https //www youtube com/c/richtexturescrochet/ skill level intermediate gauge each flower = 2 inches finished size 22 inches x 98 inches yarn 10 cotlin™ by knitpicks/wecrochet® 70% tanguis cotton 30% linen 50 g approx 123 yds light weight 3 colour raindrop #u222 hook size g 4 mm hook adjust hook size if necessary to obtain correct gauge notions yarn needle
